Summary: Red glowing craft flew fast over loch Raven Reservoir
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Towson
There were no other sightings in Towson on or around January 3rd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband was out jogging at night and saw a red glowing craft above the tree line fly by extremely fast. Immediately after there were helicopters and planes flying by all over the area. The craft was definitely but a plane and was flying faster then any man made aircraft would go.
